ca.concordia.lanterns.services

Interface ValidateGame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidateGameImpl

    public interface ValidateGame
    Generic Validate Game interface. Validates if information in game object is valid.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_PLAYERS 
      static int MIN_PLAYERS

    • Method Detail

      • validatePlayerCount

        void validatePlayerCount(Game game)
        Validates the number of players in the game. Number of players should be between 2-4.
        Parameters:
        game - a particular game session or state, either resumed from a saved file or new session.

      • validateLanternCards

        void validateLanternCards(Game game)
        Validates the number of lantern cards in player hands and on the table based on player count and card colours.
        Parameters:
        game - a particular game session or state, either resumed from a saved file or new session.

      • validateDedicationToken

        void validateDedicationToken(DedicationTokenWrapper[] dedications,
                             Player[] players)
        Validates the number of dedication tokens in player hands and on the table.
        Parameters:
        dedications - a maximum number of 30 dedication tokens can be in the game. There are four possible types.
        players - number of players in the game (2-4)

      • validateStartPlayerMarker

        void validateStartPlayerMarker(Player[] player,
                               int startPlayerMarker)
        Validates that the start player marker has been given to a player.
        Parameters:
        player - only one player should have a start player marker.
        startPlayerMarker - should exist, and should be in the hand of a player.

      • validateFavorToken

        void validateFavorToken(Game game)
        Validates that the total number of favor tokens in the game is 20.
        Parameters:
        game - a particular game session or state, either resumed from a saved file or new session should have 20 favor tokens.

      • validateLakeTileStack

        void validateLakeTileStack(Player[] players,
                           LakeTile[][] lake,
                           java.util.Stack<LakeTile> tileStack,
                           int currentTurnPlayer)
        Validates that the correct number of lake cards is present in the game, relative to the number of players.

        Validates that players have no more than 3 lake tiles in their hand at any time.

        Also validates that player have 3 lake tiles in their had for the begining on the game.

        Parameters:
        players - each player should have 3 lake cards in their hand at the start of the game.
        lake - The lake may contain anywhere from 1 to all lake Tiles.
        tileStack - Stack of tiles not picked up yet.
        currentTurnPlayer - The player currently playing his turn must put down a lake tile.
